subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, who won all three of her round-robin matches in straight sets, powered past a sluggish Agnieszka Radwanska in the semifinals of the WTA Championships, 6-2, 6-1.
snippet: Serena Williams, who won all three of her round-robin matches in straight sets, powered past a sluggish Agnieszka Radwanska in the semifinals of the WTA Championships, 6-2, 6-1.
